column5: Okay, we only have a few days left before the tourney starts.  I've put this on the roster thread but if we don't get 4 more sign ups, we can't assign the people who want to be on a team signed up.  If anyone is interested, please sign up.   Thank you.    Also, those teams who have decided on a name, please PM me the name if you have not already!  Thanks  Joey
If you're short I'll give it a go, added my name to the roster page......
If my math is correct there are now 9 members waiting. Just need one more.  Catch and release oldbassguy nancur373 Richmond Hill Fisher West Arm Rider Joeytier Crossover Tracker Fishindevil
Oh and I like Tybo's idea for team names if captains have not submitted names.  Losers 3 Loosers 4 Losurs 5
Im in for the tournament so we can get the waiting members on a team
